item.title: HOW TO FIX: .htaccess & permalinks not working in WordPress
item.description: If you’re setting up WordPress on a new server you may find that your custom permalinks don’t work and worse changes you make to your .htaccess file are ignored or have no effect. It sounds like you need to modify your VHOST configuration file on your web server. Modify VHOST to AllowOverride By default AllowOverride is disabled, this means .htaccess files and files like php.ini are ignored. Even if you enable mod_rewrite using sudo a2enmod rewrite your .

item.title: HOW-TO install Ubuntu using Virtualbox on a Mac
item.description: How easy is it to install Ubuntu on your Mac– this quick visual guide will have Ubuntu running within your Mac os X in under 20mins.If you’re really keen – maybe you want to use my guide on Virtualbox & install Windows XP on your MacGetting Started Follow my instructions to download and install Virtualbox on your Macor Grab a copy of Virtualbox from virtualbox.org Virtualbox Main Screen Launch Virtualbox and click on New Virtualbox Create New Virtual Machine for Ubuntu Give your new virtual machine a name like Ubuntu Select Linux and Ubuntu from the drop downs Virtualbox Set Memory Set base memory to at least 1Gb.
